name: 陳維昌
objective:
正交分頻多工（OFDM）和多輸入多輸出（MIMO）技術是無線和行動通信中相當熱門的傳輸技術。OFDM和MIMO技術具有多種優勢，例如：提高傳輸資料速率和改善接收效能。在課堂上，我們將學習OFDM和MIMO的基本原理和一些進階主題。在學期末時，選修這門課程的學生必須針對OFDM或MIMO相關之主題進行期末專題報告。

本課程為中英雙語課程。

Orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) and multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) techniques are popular transmission techniques for wireless and mobile communications, because they offer several advantages such as increasing transmission data rate and enhancing error performance. In the class, we will learn about the basic principles and some advanced topics of OFDM and MIMO. All students taking this class have to study a special topic on OFDM or MIMO as a final project. Some parts of this course will be offered in English.
schedule:
Week 01. Reviews of probability and random process theories (複習機率與隨機過程)
Week 02. Review of detection theory (複習偵測理論)
Week 03. Review of estimation theory (複習估計理論)
Week 04. Review of channel capacity (複習通道容量)
Week 05. OFDM: Signal model, orthogonality and efficient implementation (介紹OFDM訊號模型、正交性與快速實現法)
Week 06. OFDM: Equalization for CP-OFDM (介紹CP-OFDM的等化)
Week 07. OFDM: Equalization for ZP-OFDM (介紹ZP-OFDM的等化)
Week 08. OFDM: Synchronization and channel estimation (介紹OFDM的同步與通道估測)
Week 09. Midterm Exam (期中考)
Week 10. OFDM: SC-FDE, DFT-S-OFDM, and OFDMA
Week 11. OFDM: Power allocation (介紹用於OFDM的功率負載技術)
Week 12. OFDM: PAPR problem and PAPR reduction techniques (介紹OFDM的PAPR的問題及解決方案)
Week 13. OFDM: Large OOB emission problem and OOB emission reduction techniques (介紹OFDM的帶外能量逸散的問題及解決方案)
Week 14. MIMO: Error performance in fading channels, maximal ratio combining, and selection combining.  (衰減通道之BER分析、MRC與SC)
Week 15. MIMO: Space-time block code and spatial precoding (空時碼與空間編碼)
Week 16. MIMO: Spatial multiplexing and spatial modulation (空間複用與空間調變)
Week 17. Final Exam (期末考)
Week 18. Student Oral Presentation (學生期末報告)

The schedule may be adjusted if necessary.
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam         30%
Final Exam           30%
Special Topic Report 40% (20% for Oral Presentation and 20% for Paper Report)

期中考     30%
期末考     30%
期末專題   40% (口頭報告 20% + 書面報告 20%)
